long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The TalentLex extension allows law students to:
- Track when others are hearing back from firms
- Consistently score above 75% on the Watson Glaser test
- Sync onerous fields such as the work experience section when applying to firms through AllHires, cVmail or Candid.

The extension is directly linked to the main web app, which tells users why their application has been rejected and where they could improve: https://talentlex.app/
